Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Firaxis::
       He nods solemnly and keys a few commands into a keypad on his arm to 
activate the ships autopilot.  It approaches the area around the sphere 
setting off an alarm.  "Oops.  I forgot to give the ship clearance to be here 
... oh well, it's probably better this way in case it ever gets stolen."  He 
gestures to his ship.  "Shall we depart?"

--part1_122.13af3a73.2a579ae6_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>::Firaxis::
<BR>       He nods solemnly and keys a few commands into a keypad on his arm to activate the ships autopilot.  It approaches the area around the sphere setting off an alarm.  "Oops.  I forgot to give the ship clearance to be here ... oh well, it's probably better this way in case it ever gets stolen."  He gestures to his ship.  "Shall we depart?"</FONT></HTML>
